sentences.en: A chair is a tangible object.
A common denominator of many low - stress jobs is tangible results.
sentences.cn: 许多低压力的工作都有个共同点那就是其效果切实可见.

sentences.en: Both forms are readily gasified by electrical discharge without leaving any tangible residue.
sentences.cn: 两种形态都易被放电气化而不剩任何可触察的残余.

sentences.en: For we had tangible reasons to take the threat seriously.
sentences.cn: 因为我们确实有理由认真对待这种威胁.

sentences.en: He had an eager inward life with little enjoyment of tangible things.
sentences.cn: 他过去重视内心生活,以致在享受有形物质方面,未免有所疏忽.

sentences.en: He had demonstrated to all those obsessed with the tangible the transcendence of visionary.
sentences.cn: 他向所有那些纠缠于眼前事物的人们显示了他的远见卓识.

sentences.en: His drive for tangible accomplishments counterbalanced by an equal drive for correctness.
sentences.cn: 他既要求有形的成果,又要求正确性.

sentences.en: I think that there was probably some more tangible cause.
sentences.cn: 我想很可能有更确切的原因.

sentences.en: It is the only tangible object the astronomer can handle.
sentences.cn: 这是天文学家能够掌握的唯一可接触的对象.

sentences.en: Language is a storehouse of soundimages, and writing is tangible form of those images.
sentences.cn: 语言既然是音响形象的堆栈, 文字就是这些形象的可以捉摸的形式.

sentences.en: Sculpture is a tangible art form.
sentences.cn: 雕刻是一种可触摸的艺术形式.

sentences.en: Service industries do not produce tangible objects, such as automobiles or refrigerators.
sentences.cn: 服务业并不生产可以触摸到的物品, 如汽车和电冰箱.
这种解脱几乎可以感觉得到。

sentences.en: The scheme must have tangible benefits for the unemployed.
sentences.cn: 这个计划一定要对失业者有实实在在的好处。

sentences.en: The silence of the countryside was almost tangible .
sentences.cn: 乡村的寂静几乎能感觉得到。

sentences.en: There should be some tangible evidence that the economy is starting to recover.
sentences.cn: 应该有明显迹象表明经济开始复苏了。

sentences.en: You're on to somethellong tangible and need act fast.
sentences.cn: 你需要在一些切实的事情步履快一些.

phrases.tran_cn: 有形和无形资产；有形资产和无形资产
明确的证据；确实证据；可见证据

trans.tran_cn: 可触知的，确实的，真实的，实际的，[法]有形的
trans.tran_en: if something is tangible, you can touch or feel it
